Hinduism.summary: Diverse Indian tradition teaching karma, dharma, reincarnation, and liberation (moksha) through spiritual realization.

Buddhism.summary: Philosophy of enlightenment founded by Siddhartha Gautama, emphasizing the Four Noble Truths and Nirvana.

Jainism.summary: Ancient Indian faith emphasizing extreme non-violence (ahimsa), truth, and spiritual liberation through asceticism.

Sikhism.summary: Monotheistic Indian faith founded by Guru Nanak emphasizing devotion to one God, equality, and service.
